introduction.text: In accordance with the provisions of the {0}, the identity of the various parties involved in the creation and monitoring of the Festivo website is specified to its users.

edition.title: Site Publisher
edition.text_1: This website, accessible at the URL https://festivo-tawny.vercel.app (the "Site"), is published by:
edition.text_2: Ghislaine AYBRAM, residing at 1 avenue Victor Hugo 92190 MEUDON.
edition.text_3: The Site's Publishing Director is Ghislaine AYBRAM.

properties.text_1: Ghislaine AYBRAM owns the intellectual property rights and holds the usage rights for all elements accessible on the website, including text, images, graphics, logos, and icons. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, or adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site, regardless of the method or process used, is prohibited without prior written permission from Ghislaine AYBRAM.

jurisdiction.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.text: Any dispute related to the use of the website https://festivo-tawny.vercel.app is subject to French law. Except where the law does not allow it, exclusive jurisdiction is granted to the competent courts of NANTERRE.
